pages.text: These hammers are a must-have for the discerning builder! They give you the ability to place random blocks from your hotbar, perfect for creating texture in a build! Each tier of hammer is capable of using more slots than the previous one, from 4 (stone) to 8 (netherite).
Simply place the blocks you want to use to the right of the hammer, then right-click the hammer all over your build to place random blocks!
You can even control the ratio of blocks to place by using different size stacks of each block type.
